info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 10:50PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton and east central Herkimer Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1049 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Limekiln Lake Campground, or 10 miles southeast of Old Forge, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Inlet, Eighth Lake Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Lewey Lake Campground, Limekiln Lake Campground, Raquette Lake, Golden Beach Campground, Hasbroucks, West Canada Lakes, Herkimer Landing, Caswell Lake, Sagamore, Woods, Sagamore Lake and Kamp Kill Kare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
